sourcesContent: import { MatDialogRef, MAT_DIALOG_DATA } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import IMovie from 'src/app/models/Movie'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movie-dialog', templateUrl: './movie-dialog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movie-dialog.component.css'] }) export class MovieDialogComponent implements OnInit { constructor( public MatDialogRef: MatDialogRef, @Inject(MAT_DIALOG_DATA) public data: IMovie, ) { } ngOnInit() { } onCancel(){ } }
